metadata.title: CVE-2018-13843 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue has been found in HTSlib 1.8. It is a memory leakin bgzf_getline in bgzf.c. NOTE: the software maintainer's position is thatthe "failure to free memory" can be fixed in applications that use theHTSlib library (such as test/test_bgzf.c in the original report) and is nota library issue.

criterions.comment: htslib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
